name: Ulysses Le Québec authentique - Lanaudière et Mauricie
categories: Le Québec authentique - Lanaudière et Mauricie
description: A guide to the regions of Lanaudière and Mauricie in Quebec. Discover the local attractions, explore the outdoor activities, take part in festivals, and enjoy the cultural experience. Includes recommendations for where to eat, where to stay, and what to do. (Text in French)
